thread.title: 6-year-old brings suspected heroin to school to show teacher
thread.title_full: 6-year-old brings suspected heroin to school to show teacher | New York Post

author: Larry Celona
title: 6-year-old brings suspected heroin to school to show teacher
text:
A 6-year-old Queens boy went to school Friday morning carrying a container with suspected heroin inside, law-enforcement sources told The Post.
The child innocently brought the stash of white powder to PS 209 in Whitestone in his backpack and showed it to his teacher, sources said.
The teacher immediately notified higher-ups, and the police were called.
The substance is being tested, but preliminary results show it to be heroin, sources said.
Cops were questioning the 6-year-old kidâ€™s mother, sources said.
